txt.en: Somewhere in Maustazg should be some evidence of the Enemy's plans
You have found the Orcs' orders
There is nothing of interest in this box
While patrolling the Entwash Vale, the opportunity has arisen to seek the cause of the Orcs' invasion.
While burning the tents of the Orcs at Maustazg, the opportunity has arisen to seek the cause of the Orcs' invasion.\n\nYou should search boxes to find evidence of the source of the Orcs' invasion.
Supply boxes can be found throughout Maustazg, east of Eaworth, in the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should look in the supply boxes of the Orcs for something indicating the cause of the invasion.

'This is ill news, [placeholder]. These orders are in the common speech, rather than the Orcs' fell tongue, which means their true leader is not of Orc-kind.\n\n'Worse still, they tell of a traitor in our midst. We must be watchful, lest the Orcs learn of our plan.'
Supply boxes can be found throughout Maustazg, east of Eaworth, in the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should look in the supply boxes of the Orcs for something indicating the cause of the invasion.
Ingmar is in the Mead Hall of Eaworth, north-west of Maustazg.\n\nYou should bring the Orcs' orders back to Ingmar.
Bring the Orcs' orders to Ingmar in the Mead Hall of Eaworth
